entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
